subject: Re: [junit] Concurrent runner for Junit 4
msgSnippet: Jacob, Sorry there s been no answer.  I m unaware of an out-of-the-box solution, but I hope that it would not be hard to write.  A patch or feature request is
messageBody:
Jacob,

Sorry there's been no answer. I'm unaware of an out-of-the-box
solution, but I hope that it would not be hard to write. A patch or
feature request is welcome.

David Saff

On 6/29/07, jacob.champness <jacob.champness@...> wrote:
> I know it's been asked a couple of times, but it never seems to have
> been answered very clearly. Is there a way to run tests concurrently
> in Junit 4 like we used to be able to with ActiveTestSuite in Junit 3?
>
